title: 'Once I saw A'ja do it, I did it': How Wilson's leg sleeve inspired a new generation
description: The three-time MVP's practical solution to keeping her legs balanced has taken hold across the sports world.
author: Myron Medcalf

title: Sources: Guardians' Ortiz faces gambling inquiry
description: Guardians right-hander Luis Ortiz is under investigation by MLB after a betting-integrity firm flagged a pair of pitches that had received unusual gambling activity, sources told ESPN.
author: David Purdum and Jeff Passan

title: Death of Liverpool forward Jota leaves football world in shock
description: The football world is mourning the death of Liverpool and Portugal forward Diogo Jota, aged 28, in a car crash.

title: England lose top-order wickets after Gill's 269
description: England's top order is blown away after Shubman Gill's 267 to leave the hosts requiring their most unlikely turnaround yet under Ben Stokes.

title: Natasha Cloud and Sabrina Ionescu lift the Liberty to an 89-79 win over the Sparks
description: Natasha Cloud scored 11 of her 23 points in the third quarter and sparked a huge run to lead the New York Liberty to an 89-79 victory over the Los Angeles Sparks on Thursday night. Breanna Stewart added 17 points and 14 rebounds and Sabrina Ionescu had 20 points for New York (12-5). The defending champion Liberty trailed 53-42 midway through the third before Cloud and Ionescu got going.
author: DOUG FEINBERG

title: Caitlin Clark hilariously high-fived Stephanie White after the Fever coach got a tech
description: Caitlin Clark absolutely loved her coach, Stephanie White, picking up a tech.

title: Owen Farrell to be called up to Lions squad
description: Owen Farrell is set to be called up to the British and Irish Lions Tour.

title: Diogo Jota was an inspiration to others in rising to win it all
description: The image in the mind's eye is one of exuberance, of optimism. It is the memory of that small but sturdy frame scampering after the ball, hunting opportunities, that will endure. Diogo Jota just loved playing football.
